snippet: Jeff Schwarz prepares a red curry coconut sauce tailor-made for the little cabbage, which is currently flying off farmers’ market stands in the Hamptons.
abstract: Jeff Schwarz prepares a red curry coconut sauce tailor-made for the little cabbage, which is currently flying off farmers’ market stands in the Hamptons.

byline.original: By JEFF SCHWARZ and GREG KESSLER

headline.main: A Chef in the Field | Bok Choy
